snippet.title: November Update - SoTF Devlog #5
snippet.description:
We're trying something new, a video #devlog! In the past I've posted videos here that were more like lectures but now that the game is in Early Access we'll be doing video updates on our month-to-month progress too. Hope you all have a great holiday season!

0:00 - Intro
00:23 - Rewards & Punishments
02:06 - Desert Biome
03:13 - Beatle Enemy
04:12 - Lonliness
05:29 - Shop + Trade Deals
07:03 - Next month + holidays

→ steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1274210/The_Song_of_the_Fae/
→ itch.io: https://twopm.itch.io/bard-game
→ patreon: https://www.patreon.com/twopm

→ twitch (dev streams): https://www.twitch.tv/vivavolt
→ discord: https://discord.gg/sxseuXhP
→ twitter (game): https://twitter.com/songofthefae
→ twitter (personal): https://twitter.com/vivavolt
